mapper.select: SELECT d. check_equipment_no checkEquipmentNo, s. device_name deviceName, s.vehicle_number vehicleNumber, sum(ride_number) rideNumber FROM device_check_info d inner JOIN device_car_equipment s ON d.check_equipment_no = s.device_no WHERE DATE_FORMAT(d.check_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), "%Y-%m-%d") and d.company_no = #{companyNo} GROUP BY d. check_equipment_no,s. device_name,s.vehicle_number
